titleStmt.title: Diuine poems containing the history of [brace] Ionah, Ester, Iob, Sampson : Sions [brace] sonets, elegies / written and newly augmented by Fra. Quarles.
titleStmt.author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.F. for I. Marriot, and are to be sold at his shop in St. Dunstans Church-yard in Fleet-streete,

notesStmt.note: Each section has special t.p.; "Feast for wormes" has 1633 imprint, all other sections are dated 1632.
Imprint dates for both t.p. (1633) and added engraved t.p. (1632) suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

A feast for wormes -- Pentelogia -- Hadassa (The historie of Ester) -- Iob militant -- The historie of Samson -- Sions sonets -- Sions elegies -- An alphabet of elegies vpon the much and truly lamented death of ... Dr. Ailmer.

place.placeName: his shop in St. Dunstans Church-yard in Fleet-streete
